review: I've been looking for a reliable pressure reducing valve for my home, and the Zurn Wilkins 1-70XLDU did not disappoint. The build quality is top-notch, and the ease of installation was a pleasant surprise. The valve has significantly improved the water pressure stability in my house, and the price is very reasonable compared to local supply houses. It's a great value for the money and a trusted brand that has stood the test of time. Highly recommend!
